content: Yeah, I think a sightseeing pass could be a great way to save time and money. I've been to NYC a few times before, but my friend has never been, so we're both excited to explore the city together. We've already started making a list of all the attractions we want to see, and a pass would definitely help us make the most of our 5-day trip. Do you think we should prioritize booking our accommodations and then focus on planning out our itinerary, or should we try to plan out our itinerary first and then book our accommodations based on our plans?
